item.title: Short CV
item.description:
Research Interests

  • PFAS–microplastic interactions and aging
  • Environmental fate and transport in soils and aquatic systems
  • Mechanistic toxicology and membrane transport
  • Reactive transport modeling (DOM–MP–PFAS interactions)
  • Advanced treatment technologies (bio-membranes, ultrafiltration benchmarking)
  • Multiscale molecular modeling (MD, DFT) integrated with descriptor-based frameworks
